    # PXL Web Vagrant

    Welcome to PXL Web Vagrant - a Ubuntu Vagrant environment for web development.

    • Open source ðŸ’¯
      • Help make PXL Web Vagrant better pull request
    • Easy powerful configuration through config.yaml
    • PHP
      • Version 5.6 & 7.0-7.3
      • Support for multiple versions running simultaneously
      • Caching with Memcached and APC
    • Node.js
    • Web servers
      • Apache
      • NGINX
      • Built-in helper commands for managing virtual host configurations, e.g. create_apache_site and edit_nginx_site
    • Databases
      • MySQL
      • MongoDB
      • Built-in helper commands for creating and deleting databases, .e.g create_database and delete_database
    • Caching
      • Redis
    • Shell
      • LiquidPrompt
      • tmux
        • tmuxinator
    • Other
      • Support for custom Vagrant provisioning scripts
